findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may be excessive, potentially leading to complications in enforcement or changes in business circumstances.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting a bond can expose the Receiving Party to significant risk, as they may face legal actions without adequate financial protection.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may limit business flexibility and future transactions, potentially complicating mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
